text: Gurkanwal Kaur is an Indian Politician from the state of Punjab. Kaur represented the Jalandhar Cantt Assembly Constituency from 2002–2007. Kaur was from the Indian National Congress but in 2017 she joined Bharatiya Janata Party in the presence of Union finance minister Arun Jaitley and Punjab BJP president, Vijay Sampla.After 1 day in BJP she rejoined Congress Party in the presence of Capt Amrinder Singh President Punjab CongressEx-CM Beant Singh's daughter joins BJPBeant Singh’s daughter Gurkanwal Kaur joins BJP ==Family== Kaur's brother Tej Parkash Singh was a minister in the Punjab government and her father Beant Singh was the Chief Minister of Punjab from 1992–1995. == See also == * Political families of Punjab, India ==External links== *Election Commission of India Punjab State Elections 2002 *Punjab Assembly Elections-2002 winners ==References== Category:Living people Category:Indian National Congress politicians Category:People from Punjab, India Category:People from Jalandhar Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Punjab Category:Members of the Punjab Legislative Assembly Category:21st- century Indian politicians Category:Women in Punjab, India politics Category:21st-century women politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Gurkanwal Kaur
